reviewText: Two classic movies from the 80's.  Full of laughs and good humor.  Highly recommended.

This is a surprisingly good buy.  I remember watching both of these movies in theater in the late 1980's and enjoying them back then.  Uncle Buck is a very satisfying John Candy movie that can be watched several times without growing tiresome.  The surprise was that I could sit through a movie starring Chevy Chase.  Fletch was actually a decent movie that was worth watching once or twice.  Kudos to the manufacturer combining these two movies into a single package.
Both of these movies are hysterical classics!  Love them both!
I don't have a blue-ray players
Two great films in one. Perfect for the Christmas holiday. Excellent quality.
Two off my favorite. Chevy Chase was in his peak. John Candy was superb as the uncle who really cares.
Great double feature BLU RAY! Great price...and you can't go wrong with John Candy.
Two great classics at a very low price.  Can't go wrong.
Uncle Buck is a perfect 80's John Hughes style comedy.  Fletch is less than perfect but I think Uncle Buck more than makes up for what passes for comedy in this film.
Quick ship, great movies, great price!
Not much for extra features, but quality was better than DVD and price was reasonable.
I like these movies on blue ray, finally replacing my bag tapes
